title: Izzo's yelling par for the NFL course;AAF onside kick would be a win for the NFL; Gronk is a championship teammate
itunes:title: Izzo's yelling par for the NFL course;AAF onside kick would be a win for the NFL; Gronk is a championship teammate
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff explains why Tom Izzo's yelling wouldn't be criticized in the NFL, why the NFL needs to adopt the AAF's onside kick immediately, why Gronk being the ultimate championship teammate, not stats, is the most impressive aspect of his Hall of Fame resume, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag.. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
